name: Journey To The Edge
description:
Play as a Flat-Earther on a quest to find the edge of the world, unveiling a conspiracy centuries in the making. To have the best experience play Minecraft music in the background and pretend I wrote it. New features coming soon.

Controls:                                                                                                                                                                           A and D, Move                                                                                                                                                               Space, Jump                                                                                                                                                                    C, Attack

Developers note: It probably defeats the purpose of it to say it, but there is an alternate ending if you beat the last level without dying.
